node.title: Te Tairāwhiti roads to re-open after flooding
node.description: Main roads in Te Tairāwhiti are being re-opened with restrictions after being damaged by severe rain.
node.content:
["Main roads in Te Tairāwhiti are being re-opened with restrictions after being damaged by severe rain.", "", "
A section of the bridge in Tokomaru Bay has been wiped out by flood water, bisecting the town alongside State Highway 35 Photo: RNZ / Angus Dreaver
", "From Monday, light vehicles can travel the Mata, Tuakau and Ihungia roads loop between 8am and 12pm, and 3pm to 7pm.", "Entry will be controlled at all times, with a one-way system.", "A Gisborne District Council spokesperson says they are waiting for the roads to dry more out before fully reopening them.", "Barring more bad weather, the traffic system will continue until the bridge at Tokomaru Bay is reinstated, expected on 13 April.", "More details about when the roads will be open are available on the council's website."]
